short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you know what you're buying on Google Flights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension shows users the likelihood that a flight will be delayed based on historical data. You can then use this data to make a more informed decision of which airline to shell out hundreds or thousands of dollars to based on their likelihood of screwing you over.
